articles.description: Pricing for the 2021 Kia Carnival has been released, ahead of the model's imminent arrival in local showrooms. Details published on Kia Australia's website reveal the new-generation, eight-seater p...
articles.content:
New-generation people mover priced from $50,390 to $69,990 drive-away.
Pricing for the 2021 Kia Carnival has been released, ahead of the model's imminent arrival in local showrooms.
